title: Calories in Wraps at Subway
meta_description: Discover calories in wraps at subway, including macros, sodium, and variations for popular options like turkey or chicken wraps.
assumptions: Standard 11-inch wrap with turkey breast, lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, onions, green peppers, and 1 tbsp light mayo; no cheese or extra sauces.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, customizations, portion sizes, and exact ingredients. Check Subway's app or site for latest values.

quick_answer.text: A standard Subway turkey wrap has about 430 calories and 25 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a turkey wrap at Subway?
faqs.a: About 430 calories for a standard turkey breast wrap with veggies and light mayo.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in wraps at Subway?
faqs.a: Typically 50 g carbs per wrap, mostly from the flatbread.

faqs.q: Are Subway wraps high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 1200 mg per wrap due to bread and meatsâ€”watch if on a low-sodium diet.

faqs.q: Calories in a veggie wrap at Subway?
faqs.a: A Veggie Delite wrap is about 230-280 calories, lower without protein.

faqs.q: How does customization affect calories in wraps at Subway?
faqs.a: Extras like cheese (+50 kcal), double meat (+100-200 kcal), or sauces can add 50-300 calories.
